name: The North Face Etip Recycled Gloves - Men's
description:
Wrap your hands in a layer of lightweight fleece to protect them from chills during cold-season runs. The palm side is fully conductive for use with your phone or music player. Silicone dots ensure it won't slip out of your hand.Recycled polyester and elastane fleece is warm and breathable.Touchscreen-compatible palm and fingers let you use your smartphone without getting cold fingers.Radiametric Articulation™ keeps your hands in a natural relaxed position.4-way stretch for unrestricted movement.Silicone grippers on palm for a secure grip.

        Sustainability
